text.__SUMMARY__: Bothrops marajoensis, or the Marajó lancehead, is a species of venomous snake in the  family Viperidae. It is endemic to Brazil.
text.Geographic range:
It is found in Brazil in the state of Pará.
The type locality is Severino, Marajó Island, Pará, Brazil.
text.Further reading: Hoge, A.R. 1966 ["1965"]. Preliminary account on Neotropical Crotalinae (Serpentes: Viperidae). Memórias do Instituto Butantan 32: 109-184.
